properties.title: GRID3 SLE - Health Facilities v1.0
properties.description:
The data is available in both spatial and tabular file formats.
Coordinate system: GCS WGS 1984
For full methodological details, please see data release notes available for download here.Download the data as a zip file.
Copyright
2023.  Sierra Leone Ministry of Health and Sanitation (MoHS) and
Trustees of Columbia University in the City of New York.
Dataset citation:
Sierra Leone Ministry of Health and Sanitation (MoHS) and Center for International Earth Science Information Network (CIESIN), Columbia University. 2023. Sierra Leone National Health Facilities Dataset Version 01. Palisades, NY: Geo-Referenced Infrastructure and Demographic Data for Development (GRID3). https://doi.org/10.7916/ag19-s334. Accessed DAY MONTH YEAR
properties.purpose: The dataset consists of health facility points with name, location (where available), facility type, functionality, and ownership in Sierra Leone
